meanings.definition: The first letter of the Arabic alphabet.
meanings.sent1: Alifs are the beginning of learning the Arabic alphabet.
meanings.sent2: In Arabic, alifs come before all other letters.
meanings.sent3: The alifs decided to have a race to see who would reach the end of the alphabet first.
meanings.sent4: The alifs stood tall and proud, symbolizing the start of a new journey.
meanings.sent5: The teacher drew large alifs on the board to show the students how to write them.

meanings.definition: A type of letter used in the writing system of some languages, such as Arabic.
meanings.sent1: The book had many alifs printed on its pages.
meanings.sent2: Arabic calligraphy often features beautifully written alifs.
meanings.sent3: The alifs in the sentence seemed to dance across the page.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so elegant, especially when she wrote alifs.
meanings.sent5: The sign was decorated with intricate alifs that caught everyone's attention.
